Public Hearing Notices 

Notice of Public Hearing on the City of Hamilton 2025-2026 Fiscal Year Budget.


This webpage complies with Section 26.18 of the Tax Code, posting of tax rate and budget information by taxing unit on website.


The proposed tax rate .4623 is equal to the no-new-revenue tax rate, is below the voter-approval tax rate, and does not exceed the de minimis rate. Therefore, the proposed tax rate does not exceed the rate that would require an automatic election under Section 26.075 of the Texas Tax Code. If the City of Hamilton adopts the proposed tax rate, it will not be required to hold an election for voter approval, and qualified voters may not petition for an election to reduce the tax rate. 

Taxpayer Impact Statement For Median-Valued Homestead Property

Section 551.043, Texas Government Code

The following comparison is provided for the Median-Valued Homestead Property:

Median-Value of Homestead Properties: $141,158

  1. Current Fiscal Year Taxes: $704
  2. Estimated Taxes under Proposal Budget: $652
  3. Estimated Taxes under No-New Revenue Rate: $652
